name: Haberman Management Corp
overview:
For more than 20 years, Haberman Management Corp has served as a money management firm and as an investor in small-cap securities. The firm achieves strong returns on its investments and selects securities based on a number of distinctive screening methodologies. Haberman Management Corp maintains a balanced portfolio and focuses on diversifying its asset allocation through attention to a variety of sectors. It invests based on careful research and acquires intelligence through company meetings and industry seminars.

Based in New York City, the firm is led by Ross Haberman, president. Mr. Haberman possess years of investment experience with a range of financial instruments and has served as private investors for a number of widely recognized family-owned companies.

An active supporter of the Columbia University Celiac Disease Center, the firm also participates in fundraisers and volunteer efforts to support the Ovarian Cancer Research Fund.
